mapper.select: select TNO as taskNo, PNO as projectNo, TITLE, UIPROTOURL, CONTENT , START_DATE as startDate, END_DATE as endDate, STATUS from SPMS_TASKS where PNO =#{projectNo} and TNO =#{taskNo}
select TNO as taskNo, PNO as projectNo, TITLE, UIPROTOURL, CONTENT , START_DATE as startDate, END_DATE as endDate, STATUS from SPMS_TASKS where PNO =#{value} order by TNO desc
mapper.insert: insert into SPMS_TASKS( PNO, TITLE, UIPROTOURL, CONTENT, START_DATE, END_DATE, STATUS ) values(#{projectNo}, #{title}, #{uiProtoUrl}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{status})
mapper.delete: delete from SPMS_TASKS where PNO =#{projectNo} and TNO =#{taskNo}
